messages.title: Re-Elect Gareth Snell
messages.content: A REAL Labour voice for Stoke-on-Trent Central

issues.brexitEurope: deliver a Brexit deal that works for the Potteries

leaflet.personalStatement: I was elected as your MP on a promise to stand up for Stoke-on-Trent, deliver a Brexit deal that works for the Potteries and hold the Tories to account. On 8th June, you can be sure that Stoke-on-Trent will have a REAL Labour voice in Parliament.
